article_title: Is Obama Trying To Privatize Medicare By Stealth?

article_metadata.description: Privatizing Medicare is an anathema to the left wing of the Democratic Party. There was a period, back in the 1990s when it appeared that Democrats would cooperate with Republicans in fundamental reform of this entitlement program and it appeared that President Clinton might go along. But no more. Keeping [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
